docs.snippet: The company paid about $1.45 billion for the TV and streaming rights to the Games, which will be shown on channels operated by Eurosport....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company paid about $1.45 billion for the TV and streaming rights to the Games, which will be shown on channels operated by Eurosport.
docs.abstract: Discovery Communications wins exclusive European broadcast rights to Olympic Games from 2018 to 2024, and will pay 1.3 billion euros, or around $1.45 billion; Russian market is not covered by agreement, and Discovery will not broadcast 2018 or 2020 games in France or Britain due to previous arrangements; is first time one media company has secured rights for all of Europe.

headline.main: Discovery Gains European Rights to 4 Olympics
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Discovery Wins Rights to Broadcast Olympic Games

docs.snippet: Seeking a foothold in the United States, Major League Soccer’s teams have borrowed many of their branding ideas from Europe — after early years of trial and error....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seeking a foothold in the United States, Major League Soccer’s teams have borrowed many of their branding ideas from Europe — after early years of trial and error.
docs.abstract: Soccer clubs in United States borrow many of their branding ideas from Europe; Atlanta, team that will enter MLS in 2017, is naming their team Atlanta United F C--offering double dose of European flavor.

headline.main: When It Comes to Names, Even M.L.S. Rivals Can Be United
headline.print_headline: When It Comes to Names, Even Rivals Can Be United
